oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper of Logan Goodpasture, Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt. USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the discharge of a black man born in Overton County, Tennessee who served in Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Goodpasture served as a cook in the regiment after enlisting in February 1864 at age eigthteen. The 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA operated as part of the Governor's Guard, a cavalry brigade commanded by Tennessean Alvin Cullem Gillem. The 13th was involved in the surprise raid into Greeneville, Tenn. which resulted in the death of Confederate General John Hunt Morgan.
